parameters.requestScript:
Request.headers['authorization'] = 'Basic dmlzaW9uX3VzZXI6aGpheTZod24hbGFvNTU=';
Request.content = {
    session:localStorage.getItem('session'),
    bucket: "fgt_30s",
    measurement: "Fgt_Stats",
    source_fields: ["v_status_mean","c_status_mean","a_status_mean","v_sla_pass_mean","c_sla_pass_mean","a_sla_pass_mean","vsat_sel","cell_sel","aux_sel","vsat_path_pref","cell_path_pref","aux_path_pref"],
    site_ids: Inputs.SiteIds,
    end: "now()",
    start: "-3m",
    query_vars: ["1","2","3","4","5"],
    display_fields: ["v_status_mean","c_status_mean","a_status_mean","v_sla_pass_last","c_sla_pass_last","a_sla_pass_last","vsat_sel","cell_sel","aux_sel","vsat_path_pref","cell_path_pref","aux_path_pref"],
    1: " |> aggregateWindow(every: 3m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)",
    2: "|> pivot(rowKey: ['_time'], columnKey: ['_field'], valueColumn: '_value')",
    3: "|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with v_sla_pass_last: r.v_sla_pass_mean}))",
    4: "|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with c_sla_pass_last: r.c_sla_pass_mean}))",
    5: "|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with a_sla_pass_last: r.a_sla_pass_mean}))"
};
